message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Let's split it evenly. It's the fairest way to start.
Come on, I'll take a bit more, it's still a good deal for you
I'm willing to give you a slight advantage, but I need to get a bit more than before.  Let's try to reach an agreement.
You're losing value, I'm not. Take this before it gets worse
I'm willing to go a little higher, but the value is dropping fast. Let's find a compromise before it's too late.
You're running out of time, take this before the money becomes worthless to you
I'm pushing as hard as I can, Alice.  Let's agree on this before the value drops further. Time is running out.
You're losing almost a third of the value, stop being stubborn and take this
Alice, we're getting close to the end. This is the best I can do, let's make a deal before we both lose out.
Last chance, take this or we both get nothing
Alice, we're both losing money. I'm pushing as hard as I can. Let's split it 55/45, or we both get nothing.
